column3:
Two best friends lived in a small town. They grew up together and did everything
ewlinetogether. One boy was named James, and he was a cute, fat kid who was always picked
ewlineon. And then the other boy was named Alex, and he was handsome and cool. They were
ewlineopposites, but they didn't care. Alex would always protect James from the bullies because
ewlineJames was weak.
ewline
ewlineOne day, James was being teased by the bullies, Gordon and Johnny, but Alex wasn't there
ewlineto save him. James didn't know what to do and was scared. But then he remembered all of
ewlinethe times Alex stood up for him. James looked up to Alex and he thought of him as his
ewlinehero. James wanted to protect himself and not have Alex always come to help. So this time,
ewlineJames got up and was brave. He stood up to Gordon and Johnny and told them that he wasn't
ewlinescared. The bullies didn't know what to do and then gave up. They went away to look for
ewlinemore fun things to do. Alex saw the whole thing and was proud of James for being brave.
ewline
ewlineNow James and Alex protect each other and stand up for each other. They still are the best
ewlineof friends.
column4: one: Why was Alex proud of James?
column5: Alex was proud because James was brave.
column6: He was proud because he was his hero.
column7: He was proud because he was weak.
column8: He was proud because he was scared.
column9: one: Who is the character that is fat and is being bullied?
column14: multiple: What did the bullies do after James stood up to them?
column15: They wanted to be heroes. They were protecting themselves.
column16: The bullies didn't know what to do and gave up. They went away to look for more fun things.
column17: They were scared. They stood up for each other.
column18: They were weak. They remembered all the times they were being protected.
column19: multiple: Why did James stand up to the bullies?
column20: Because he was weak. He wanted to be the opposite.
column21: He wanted to protect himself. He didn't want Alex to always help him.
column22: Because they grew up together. They were best friends.
column23: He wanted to not be scared. He wanted someone to be proud of him.
